p: Further investigations will be focused on studying major constituents of S. kitaibelii, T. serpyllum, O. vulgare ssp. vulgare, A. millefolium and A. clypeolata EOs, such as geraniol, 1,8-cineole, p-cymene, germacrene D, nerol, camphor, sabinene, limonene, trans-caryophyllene, etc., to evaluate concentrations of the components that could be responsible for the antibacterial effect. Additional tests with a larger number of bacteria regarding the synergic potential of EOs will be implemented in our future investigations.
